case_name_full: The People of the State of New York v. Terrance Washington

opinions.opinion_text:
Appeal from a judgment of the Supreme Court, Monroe County (Stephen R. Sirkin, A.J.), rendered July 2, 2003. The judgment convicted defendant, upon a jury verdict, of murder in the second degree.
It is hereby ordered that the judgment so appealed from be and the same hereby is unanimously affirmed.
Same memorandum as in People v Washington (38 AD3d 1339 [2007]). Present—Gorski, J.E, Martoche, Smith, Lunn and Pine, JJ.

court_short_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York
court_full_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
